rules.prepare: # This package has no configure script. true
rules.build: cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS" \ CFLAGS="-g -O2 -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wdate-time" \ CC="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE-gcc" \ LD="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE-ld" \ AS="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE-as" \ AR="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE-ar"
rules.install: cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" make PREFIX="\$(DESTDIR)/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ SHLIBDIR="\$(DESTDIR)/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" \ DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
